mapper.select: select a.loginCount,a.lastLoginTime,b.userLoginCount, c.allUserCount from (SELECT count(1) as loginCount,max(create_time) lastLoginTime FROM login_record_${enterpriseId}) a , (select COUNT(distinct(user_id)) as userLoginCount from login_record_${enterpriseId}) b , (select COUNT(1) as allUserCount from enterprise_user_${enterpriseId} where active = true) c
